sentences.en: "You can depend on me," Cross assured him.
sentences.cn: “你可以信赖我，”克罗斯向他保证。

sentences.en: [with clause]the article sneered or just condescended, &B{depending on how} you read it.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章不是在嘲笑就是在摆架子，就看你如何解读了。

sentences.en: Can I depend on it that this won't take place again?
sentences.cn: 我能相信这事不再发生 吗 ?

sentences.en: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.cn: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.en: How many people use each screen? It all depends.
sentences.cn: 每个屏幕有多少人使用？这要看情况。

sentences.en: It would depend how far down the line the relationship was.
sentences.cn: 这得视这一关系到底发展到了什么程度而定。

sentences.en: Lion cubs depend on their mother to feed them.
sentences.cn: 狮子的幼仔依靠母狮喂养.

sentences.en: makes 8–10 burgers (depending on size).
sentences.cn: 做八到十个汉堡包（依大小而定）。

sentences.en: Many adults still depend on their children to work the video.
sentences.cn: 很多成年人仍然要靠孩子来操作录像机。

sentences.en: Many farmers have to depend on subsidies to make a living wage.
sentences.cn: 许多农民的基本生活工资要靠补贴来维持。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: Self-discipline, willingness, enthusiasm, that's what you must depend on.
sentences.cn: 自律、自愿与热情，这是你所必须依仗的。

sentences.en: The cooking time needed depends on the size of the potato.
sentences.cn: 烹饪时间长短取决于土豆的大小。

sentences.en: The length of time spent exercising depends on the sport you are training for.
sentences.cn: 锻炼时间长短取决于训练的体育项目。

sentences.en: The Oxfam shops depend on regular supplies of saleable items.
sentences.cn: 乐施商店靠出售一些人们定期捐赠的适销物品维持经营。

sentences.en: This is an authentic news report. We can depend on it.
sentences.cn: 这是篇可靠的新闻报道, 我们相信它.

sentences.en: What happened later would depend on his talk with De Solina.
sentences.cn: 日后之事将有赖于他与德索利纳的谈话结果。

sentences.en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentences.cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

sentences.en: You can depend on him to make a sound choice.
sentences.cn: 你可以依靠他作出正确的选择.

sentences.en: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.cn: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

sentences.en: You may depend on him to do it well.
sentences.cn: 你可以相信他能把事办好.

sentences.en: You may depend on it that he will help you.
sentences.cn: 你可以指望他来帮助你.

words.tran_cn: 可靠的，可信赖的；可信任的
依靠的；从属的；取决于…的

trans.tran_en: If you depend on someone or something, you need them in order to be able to survive physically, financially, or emotionally

trans.tran_cn: 依靠， 依赖； 信赖， 相信； 决定于， 视…而定
trans.tran_en: If you say that one thing depends on another, you mean that the first thing will be affected or determined by the second
